name: Caviar Stick Cream Eyeshadow
about: What it is:An eyeshadow stick with up to 24 hours of long wear and creamy, rich color that glides effortlessly, blends, and buildsu2014without tugging, flaking, smudging, or creasing..Highlighted Ingredients:- Raspberry Stem Cells: Ensure a smooth application..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:The iconic Caviar Stick Eyeshadowu2014now in a longer-lasting, waterproof formula with crease- and smudge-proof wearu2014is the ultimate quick fix to achieve any look effortlessly. This richly pigmented, velvety-soft, mistake-proof product allows for plenty of playtime to glide, blend, and go, with endless options..Clinical Results:In a US survey of 34 subjects:
ingredients: -Raspberry Stem Cells: Ensure a smooth application..-Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and primes skin..-Multidimensional Pigments: Impart lustrous, high-impact shimmer. ..Dimethicone, Mica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Silica, Synthetic Wax, Polyethylene, Stearoxymethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Octadecene, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Carnauba), Polysilicone-11, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylene Carbonate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polygonum Tinctorium Leaf Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Bht, Dicalcium Phosphate, Tin Oxide. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply directly to eyelids..-Blend upward and outward with your fingers or a brush..-Be sure to blend within 60 seconds before product sets...Pro tips: .-Pair multiple shades to create effortless looks. .-Top with a powder eyeshadow for enhanced wear..-For light-to-medium shades, use a flat, dense eyeshadow brush for a quick wash of color. .-To ensure seamless application closer to your lash line, use a small, flat brush..-The darker the shade, the smaller the brush. Blend light shades with a fluffy, domed brush and darker shades with a crease brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so upset when sephora discontinued their whole line of Sephora Colorful Waterproof Eyeshadow & Eyeliner Multi-Stick especially in color 05 Beige. I wore that as eyeshadow for years and years. It was a gorgeous neutral with a lil shimmer perfect for everyday. I couldnu2019t match the color online so went into the store. The woman helped me (not many options to choose from) and bought this laura mercier one instead. (I wouldu2019ve matched it with the new Sephora eyeliners but very few colors to choose from and mostly weird bright colors.) So the Color was the closest match, even though a lil darker but tried it anyway. First time I use it and the whole stick falls out. Mind you itu2019s $33u20133x the price as the sephora one! But the worst part is it DOESNu2019T last all day like it says. Iu2019ve tried it for 2 weeks now and everyday it runs into my liquid eyeliner (that never budged) and smears, never ever had that issue. Im desperate I want the old sephora colors back :(

The Laura Mercier Amethyst Caviar Stick Eye Shadow is a gem in the world of cream eyeshadows. This iconic shadeu2014a stunning taupe-plum with a hint of shimmeru2014offers a versatile color that flatters a wide range of skin tones. The formula is creamy and glides on effortlessly, providing intense pigmentation with a single swipe. It blends seamlessly, allowing for both subtle daytime looks and sultry evening drama.  This eyeshadow is also really long-lasting. I would recommend this to anyone who likes eyeshadow!

Buildable to a point, good play time and then sets down.  Smoky Quartz is pictured as a lilac-leaning pewter, but the description says grey brown. reviews.review_title: Laura Mercier Caviar Shadow Stciks get an A+
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved Laura Mercier Modern Rose Caviar Shadow Stick from Bzzagetn and Sephora to review.   I am always quite leery of shadow sticks, as I have not been too satisfied with them in the past, but the Cavoar Sticks habe changed that for me.   The formula is nice and creamy, it glides on smooth and easy without having to put too much pressure on the lid or having the pull the lid tight to apply nor do they get gooey or sticky.  It's pigment is beautiful and the shimmer also doesn't affect the quality of the formula or application. It can be used to line, highlight, accent, fill, blend with fingers or a brush. It can also be used on the go. It's a nice quick application.   These sticks can be used by novice and expert alike easily achieving a great look that doesn't smudge, crease or fade throughout the day even without use of a primer!   I habe already purchased 2 other shades from this line and I tell absolutely everyone about it! If you haven't tried the Laura Mercier Caivar Shadow Sticks, do it now, don't miss out on this amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a The Caviar Stick Eyeshadow - Strapless for free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.   My main impression of this product isn't anything actually about it, but when I wear it PEOPLE NOTICE IN THE BEST WAY. Come in to work with no sleep after being sick for a week, and multiple people commented on how even though the rest of me looked like death, my eyes looked so awake and vibrant. This is entirely due to the caviar stick. When you wear it people go out of their way to compliment it, pretty much every time I have worn it someone mentions how bright my eyes are and it is great.   As for application this product is ridiculously easy. One swipe is enough for all day coverage (I am very pale) It is quite buildable, but due to my paleness it mostly builds the copper sparkle then suddenly the base becomes quite brown. Basically it is sparkles until smoky eye. There is also a green element in the sparkles that really helped with my fair olive skin tone, wish more products included this since it isn't noticeable on the eye but really brightens up my whole tone.   As with any stick style eyeliner you will want to be a bit careful, I did get too excited and overopened it when trying for swatches and a bit of the tip broke off, but this was my fault and the broken bit did reconnect so it is still completely usable (unlike pretty much every other one I've broken, this one was actually entirely salvageable) The stick is a little thicker and the consistency is soft but strong so it can be deceiving, it works really well when overextended, but I would avoid that since it will break eventually.  As for longevity, this stuff lasts. Usually sparkles end up everywhere, and the base color evaporates, but not with the caviar stick. After application I immediately rubbed the heck out of it and only had a tiny amount of sparkle migration. You will need makeup remover to get it off.   It is everything I ever wanted in an eyeshadow and more. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: First off, yes I received this product for free to review but Iu2019m NOT one of the people that only give rave reviews to anything they get for free. People that do that are ruining the reviews section as a viable tool for decision making and they suck. That being said, this eyeshadow stick is the sh*t. I have u201cstraplessu201d which is described as u201csoft nudeu201d and in the pictures it looks like a cool, light grey-brown, kinda taupe-y, kinda like the color of hot chocolate. IRL itu2019s a bit warmer than thatu2014 I was hoping it would be more like cobblestone looks in the pictures, but Iu2019m still wearing it. My favorite part about it though, is the fact that it actually doesnu2019t crease on my oily eyelids, which is kind of insane! I typically layer it on top of a little bit of foundation or concealer, then blend it out with a finger, and then let it dry down for a few seconds and it lasts all day without creasingu2014 doesnu2019t even need to be set with eyeshadow! And like I said my skin is on the oily side for sure. I also saw that lots of other reviews said that the product fell out of the packaging and I have use mine at least 10 times and have had zero issues with that, for the record. Maybe itu2019s only certain colors? I would for sure recommend this to other people, and I do plan on repurchasing as well as probably purchasing a few additional colors. I donu2019t think Iu2019ve ever used another eyeshadow u2013 in stick form, powder form or any other form u2013 that didnu2019t eventually crease. I hope they never change the formula!

Most eyeshadow sticks Iu2019ve tried make it so difficult to apply the color to your eyelid and so I donu2019t use them because eyelids are such delicate parts of the face and I donu2019t like having to rub them hard to get color to apply. I donu2019t want to know what people who are making money off the products say, I want to hear from real people. So from one real person to another, I can honestly say this eyeshadow is amazing. I am obsessed with anything rose gold, but have never looked good in rose gold eyeshadow. Laura Mercier has done a phenomenal job with the pigmentation of their caviar stick eyeshadows. Not only can you see that I am wearing eyeshadow, itu2019s sparkles and catches the light beautifully. I have always avoided stick eyeshadows because they have always been so dry and difficult to apply. That is not the case with this one. It glides on so easily and feels amazing on my skin. Itu2019s also buildable and can be blended easily which I love. But my absolute favorite thing about this eyeshadow is that it lasts all day. I donu2019t have to worry about touchups, donu2019t have to worry about bringing my eyeshadow with me if Iu2019m going to be out from morning until late night, and donu2019t have to take up extra room in my purse. I am completely sold on this product and now want one of every color. I cannot wait for my next trip to Sephora.

SMOOTH application, color is very pigmented and just gives you this wet sophisticated look. Also, love it because I am able to quickly apply it before work I even it out with my finger. It's been my go to for weeks! I definitely reccomend,  great to have for us busy gals and LOOK at all thar product you get and pictures do not give this color justice..neutrals are my fave for eyeshadow this is a new staple in my neutral routine.

reviews.review_text: This Laura Mercier Caviar Stick eyeshadow is excellent.  First, I love the amethyst shade I got.  I think it really accentuates my blue eyes!  I was a little hesitant to use a cream eyeshadow because of  bad experiences with creasing/wiping off during the day, but this one doesn't at all.  I use a primer first and then layer on the eyeshadow.  It is easy to apply, as it glides right across the eyelid.  The shade is wonderful and I love the bit of pearl shine in it! I would like to buy more so I can use the layer recommendations on the site! I received this product for free in exchange for writing the review.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color and a flexible eyeshadow stick

reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this through BzzAgent. When I first applied this product, I didnu2019t think Iu2019d like it as much as I wound up liking it! Itu2019s a very rich color, so the first time I applied it felt like too much on my eyelid for everyday wear. But I discovered that you can blend it out beautifully so from then on thatu2019s what I did: apply the color just below the crease, then use a blending brush to lighten it up and bring it past the crease. Perfection! The color can be applied more or less lightly for day or night. Itu2019s a beautiful sparkly dark brown! Longevity is good, though if you apply it more lightly, I would recommend a primer to help it pop longer.

reviews.review_text: I love the easy application of this eyeshadow. It goes on smooth and it is lightweight to the touch. The bottom twists to expose the shadow, so there is no mess or need for a brush. The color is subtle, but niceu2026. Not very dark but I like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this caviar eyeshadow stick for free for my honest review, and Iu2019m so very glad I did! After using this for a couple weeks, I can confidently say Iu2019m a fan! I love that the caviar eyeshadow stick provides rich pigment when I apply it to my eyelids, and I love that once the color sets, it wonu2019t budge all day long. It does give me some playtime once I apply it on my eyelid to blend it out before it sets. I can apply this very quickly directly to my lid, then with just the warmth of my ring finger blend it out for a one-and-done look. However, itu2019s my preference to use a stiffer eyeshadow brush to blend the edges out as it gives me a more polished final look. I love the creamy consistency and the fact that they last all day long. I was given the modern rose color, which is a beautiful shimmery shade that looks wonderful on your eyelids. I have found that putting a darker contour shade on my crease first and blending that out before applying the caviar stick to my lids has yielded an easy and beautiful look. I will definitely be purchasing more of these in both the shimmer and matte shades offered!

reviews.review_text: iu2019ve always coveted laura mercier makeup products, from the foundation and famous holy grail loose setting powder, i havenu2019t tried a product i havenu2019t been impressed with however my budget may not always allow me to do so. Eyeshadow sticks / crayons became all the rage within the past few years and i have tried many on the market! Others may dry out easily, not blend, the color range is unimpressive or the ease of application was no more than a mere let down. I gave up.  I was super excited to try this product i received for free in exchange of my honest review.  I got the Modern Rose Caviar eye stick and WOOHOO, this baby not only applied but blended and wore like a dream! Itu2019s great for when your in a rush and it easily brightens and wakens your eyes with a nude color and shimmer. Now i feel compelled to try other shades. The price is on the high side, as are most prestige brands of cosmetics, however it is important to note that price does not indicate quality.  - [ ] rest assured, quality is never sacraficed with Laura Mercier cosmetics. I would recommend these to anyone looking for eyeshadow sticks but i would forwarn the price. There are some cheaper options available, because keep in mind, this shadow stick does not have the shelf life of powdered eyeshadow (2-3 years) , it may need to be replaced more often, like every 6-9 months . be wary of where theyu2019re kept in the summer heat. this would not be an ideal item to leave inside your car  or where it could melt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying that I did recieve this Laura Mercier eyeshadow stick for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I have oily lids and I live in Texas, so when I thought about a stick eyeshadow I didn't think it would be the best fit for me. The way I usually make my eyeshadow last is to add a thick layer of translucent setting powder before I apply eye make up and I new I wouldn't be able to do that with an eyeshadow stick. If you add the hot summer we are having in texas in my mind this was a recipe for disaster. I also have mature skin so I was worried about the eyeshadow creasing, and or sitting weirdly in the fine lines. I was so pleasently surprised. The first time I wore it, I went for a more minimal make up look, and I used the caviar stick all over my lid. I did not use any setting powder, or anything else for that matter on my lid. I was mostly indoors and the eyeshadow lasted all the 8hrs I needed it to and it was actually still going strong when it was time to take my make up off. Since then I had wore it a couple different ways, I have even bought other shades of the product and I love it. It doesn't crease or sit on my fine lines, it lasts a long time, it has a soft powdery finish, and the diferent shades betwen mattes and shimery give dimention to my different eye looks. The only thing I need to be carefull of is the application. If I want to add a little more detailed line I switch to a brush instead of using the stick directly. Overall I would definitely recomend it to my friends and family.

reviews.review_text: I'd like to start by stating that I'm a makeup minimalist. I'm a skincare fanatic, but I stick to the basics when it comes to makeup.  Therefor, eyeshadow doesn't usually make it into my daily routine.   That said, when the special occasion does come (or when I just want a little something extra), this eyeshadow stick will 100% be my go-to!  First, it's so easy to apply.  I rub the stick on the lower portion of my lids & use my fingers to blend a little higher on the lid & lower brow.  Second, it's a gorgeous neutral color.  I'm fair skinned & it works so well with my complexion.   It very subtle and just that little something to enhance without screaming that I'm wearing makeup.   If you've never used an eyeshadow stick and want something that will work for everyday, this is definitely the way to go!  I know the stick will last me a while, but definitely see myself buying this again when the time comes to replace.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Modern Rose Caviar Stick Eye Shadow, a product from a brand renowned for its luxurious makeup. I was drawn to it because of its promise of rich color and easy application. The packaging is sleek and elegant, with a twist-up design that makes it convenient for on-the-go use. The stick format ensures that there's no mess, and itu2019s easy to throw in your purse for touch-ups.  The Modern Rose shade is a beautiful, soft pink with a hint of shimmer. The color looks stunning in the packaging and translates well on the skin, offering a lovely, buildable pigmentation. Application is a breeze. The creamy texture glides on smoothly without tugging at the delicate skin around the eyes. Itu2019s perfect for a quick, effortless look.  This eyeshadow blends seamlessly with other shades and products. Whether youu2019re layering it with powder eyeshadows or using it on its own, it creates a smooth, even finish. The Caviar Stick Eye Shadow boasts impressive staying power. It lasted through an entire workday without creasing or fading, even without a primer.  This product is incredibly versatile. It can be used for a subtle daytime look or layered for a more dramatic evening appearance. Additionally, it works well as an eyeliner or base for other eyeshadows.  Overall, the Modern Rose Caviar Stick Eye Shadow is a fantastic addition to any makeup collection. Its ease of use, long-lasting formula, and beautiful color make it a standout product. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a versatile and reliable eyeshadow stick.

However, I have fairly oily eye lids and the product tends to settle on the creases within a few hours even if set with powder or setting spray. I'll probably keep using this until I find a way to set it to make it last better on myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. I am tan complexion and it is very light on me. I received it in the rose gold. But itu2019s perfect for that pop of color in the inner corner of the rim and then if youu2019re blending out into a smoky eye or a darker eye, itu2019s good for the inner part. Itu2019s also great when youu2019re actually have a full eye and you just want to brighten up the center. You do have a good few minutes to blend it before it sets, but it is stunningly beautiful. Iu2019m very honest with my reviews whether I got the item for free or not and I actually like this particular one.   Iu2019m not a huge fan of the eyeshadow pencils at all. I actually donu2019t like them, but because this is a color that I personally like I think I like it better than the ones Iu2019ve tried in the past. Also, some of the ones that Iu2019ve tried in the past were much bigger and I think thatu2019s why I didnu2019t like them this one is medium width thatu2019s why i have more control and itu2019s easier to blend. In the past, Iu2019ve tried other pencil eyeshadows that were just , thick hard to rub on, this just glides and the color just deposits color evenly and in a thin layer  and I like that. It just glides very easily. Itu2019s easy to control. Youu2019re able to place it exactly where you want it. It doesnu2019t get all over the place. Itu2019s blendable. I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product incredibly easy to apply. I love that I donu2019t need a brush or anything. I will say I have monolids so a primer is absolutely necessary for me. If I donu2019t use one, I get major creasing from this product. With that said, it held up pretty well with sweat as I wore it to an outdoor concert. I received the modern rose shade which has just the slightest extra bit of shimmer with it. Overall itu2019s a really pretty color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The caviar stick eye shadow glided on with ease and stayed on all night to make my eyes pop. The color was easy to build and didnu2019t crease or smudge. Loved how easy it was to use and the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow stick. It is so creamy and glides on smoothly. The color is amazing, itu2019s not to dark and gives you the right amount of pigment. Easy to blend. I smudged a little did under my eye for a Smokey look and it was so beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The caviar stick eye shadow is an amazing product for those that are new to eye makeup. It's so easy to apply--just a quick swipe on the eyelid, followed by some blending with a brush and voila! You're good to go. The rose gold shade is lovely for day or night and it's definitely long-wear. It lasted all day on me without budging, even in the summer NYC sweatbox. Highly recommend this product for anyone, but especially those that are new to eye shadow looks. It made experimenting easy, fun, and, most importantly, successful! I received this product for free in exchange for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I received the Rose Gold Caviar Stick Eye Shadow and really enjoyed how the color complemented my light-medium olive complexion. It made for a great inner corner shadow for a little pop on my everyday makeup. My one concern with this shadow was that it was a little too creamy and would crease when I used it all over my lid.

reviews.review_title: Must have for all day wear

I'm in my 40s and this product didn't crease or add to any fine lines even when I applied a little under my eye.  I highly recommend this as a staple to your everyday routine.

I am extremely fair skinned, so I assume this is a problem most won't have but it was a bit disappointing for me personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG, I am obsessed with the Caviar Stick Eyeshadow! This stuff is magic in a stick. I love how easy it is to blend and build up the intensity, all without any tugging on my lids. Plus, it's waterproof! Perfect for all-day wear, whether I'm going for a subtle daytime look or a bold, dramatic eye. This eyeshadow stick is a total game changer for quick, effortless beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am always on the hunt for a multi tasking shadow stick that I can use in multiple ways especially when I travel. I like to pack as little as possible incase luggage is lost. When I was given the opportunity to try this from BzzAgent I was very excited since I knew that I would be able to use as both a shadow as well as a highlighter.   This product did not disappoint. It literally took my 15 seconds to apply on my lids and smudged with my finger and viola!!! I am very fair so this was a bit much as a highlighter but I am sure if I was able to choose a lighter shade it would work great. Love how it went on without any pulling and had just a hint of shimmer so it did not stick into my fine lines and wrinkles.   I will be buying other colors in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OK first off, this hooded eye girl is in love. It is sometimes really hard to find a shadow that will work with hooded eyes. reviews.review_title: Pretty little pop to your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eye Shadow in the shade Strapless. I had purchased the same shade about two years ago, but I found that it made my eyelids a bit oily and the shadow would crease throughout the day. Using a primer helped, but it was an extra step.  However, it seems like the formula has been improved. This time, I used the Caviar Stick without any primer, and I was pleasantly surprised that it didnu2019t crease at all. The shadow lasted for a really good amount of time and maintained its fresh look.  For a chic, effortless look, I highly recommend these Caviar Sticks. They are easy to apply, blend beautifully, and provide long-lasting wear without the need for a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I find the staying power of this to be much less than the powder. I didn't use this product in my crease line so can't comment on whether or not it clumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

It performs exceptionally well on hooded eyes, providing long-lasting color without the hassle of touch-ups. Highly recommended for both everyday use and travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Buttery smooth formula. Buildable application and easy to blend with just your finger. Once it dries, it's transferproof and waterproof. I tested it on the back of my hand and tried rubbing it off with my finger and a wet paper towel. No color transfer, just minimal glitter transfer. I also accidentally left it in my car for a couple of days in 90+ degree weather, and it didn't meltu2014it held its shape! I will be keeping this in my purse for a quick day-to-night look in a pinch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color as it was unique but subtle. I really loved how long this lasted as well (throughout the entire day and night). It was easy to apply and did not smudge at all.  I would absolutely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these eyeshadow sticks, they are perfect for tossing in your purse or even pants pockets! The formula dries down quickly after application, so you don't have to worry about messy smudging, even if you touch your eyes (we've all been there!). The Rose Gold shade is a beautiful shimmery option, and they offer a great selection of elegant colors to choose from.  Laura Mercier claims it's 24-hour wear!, which is amazing. I tried it for a full long day and it lasted all day without creasing or fading on me. The creamy formula blends easily and feels comfortable on the eyelids. I also looked at the ingredients, and it appears to be paraben-free, which is a plus for some people. I already got myself a second shade and planning on getting a third one!

reviews.review_title: Staple for quick and easy eye
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great formula that holds up all day even with triple digit weather. Love the shimmer and use it on a daily basis. I just blend with some bronzer for a more casual look. It can also be used as a base for more elaborate eye looks. Love that it is fine shimmer and not chunky glitter. Does not tug on skin and glides easily. Also buildable so if I want to reapply it is super easy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically forego eyeshadow in my daily makeup routine because it feels like too much of a hassle. Especially because I tend to do my makeup on the go, I don't want to lug around those giant eyeshadow pallets, numerous brushes, etc.   The Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eyeshadow makes it so easy to create a flawless eye look in the matter of seconds. It glides on easily, doesn't feel heavy, is very buildable, and lasts all day. I've only tried rosegold shade, but would consider buying others to create a multi-colored eye look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Amethyst Caviar Stick Eye Shadow. The stick went on smoothly and blended well. The only reason I did not give 5 stars was because the color was more copper than Amethyst.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow stick is beautiful, it is a lovely rose color and it is smooth an creamy, it blends well but doesn't smear or clump. It is a must buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using it for a few weeks now and I love this

reviews.review_title: Luxurious Shimmery taupe shadow in a stick!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of the caviar stick is nice, clean, and minimal.  I thought this caviar stick would be more purple, but itu2019s a shimmery taupe on my skin complexion.  I did apply an eyeshadow primer and Application was easy and smooth and just glides across your eyelid.  I used an eyeshadow brush to blend out the caviar stick and it blended beautifully with my champagne powder shadow.  The shimmery taupe goes lovely with my skin tone and eye color.  Formula lasts about 8 hours with primer underneath.  I received several compliments when wearing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this product! Firstly, itu2019s very easy to apply and very pigmented. It took me less than one minute to do each eye. I was a little scared to try the color because I thought it may wash me out, but it actually made my brown eyes pop! I wore it for about 5 hours without any creasing.

reviews.review_title: Must add to the daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a new favorite. Iu2019ve been searching for something easy I can use and pop in my bag. This is amazing. It is super smooth and creamy. Love the color I can use this all year round. Keeping a natural everyday look. Will def be trying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The name alone (Caviar Stick) gives me the impression that this is a smooth applying shadow. But being that its a crayon stick, some would think more of a harder feel. A creamy texture that glides on the skin so effortlessly. Theres no tugging that will leave skip markes so I can blend it with a brush or my finger. The color (Strapless) is this beautiful shimmering gold that shows very soft but you can still see the shadow & shine from any angle. What I like it that I can wear this alone for a simple everyday look or I can make it standout with some deeper shades. Of course I love that this shadow stick can be used on my brow bone, nose, cupid bow pr cheeks as a highlight. Creates the perfect summer smokey eye!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Imma creature of habit but also willing to try new things to see if they can join my collection and sure glad I gave this a try. I love this eyeshadow. The applicator makes it so easy to put on, it lasted all day with no smearing and I LOVED the color. Itu2019s subtle but for me thatu2019s  perfect for my day to day eyeshadow. I like that I can control the intensity as well. Depending on my mood I can be super subtle to dramatic with the same tool. Iu2019ll be purchasing other colors asap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Caviar Stick goes on smoothly. Strapless is a gorgeous color on - lots of shimmer but very little extra color. I have a very fair complexion so nudes are often too dark on me. That is not an issue with this color. My only complaint is that the color didn't last a full day. However, given that it's a stick, it is easy to toss in my bag and touch up as needed throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: a nice addition to my everyday routine

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. The shade I received is the shimmering soft nude, and it is a very cute and subtle color. The caviar eye stick glides on very smoothly and a little goes a long way. It has a slight shimmer to it, and doesn't smudge easily. Overall, I really like the applicator stick and it is very convenient for on the go, and is also less messy. I would love to see this offered in many other shades as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth application that lasts all day, easy to use. Beautiful color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eye Shadow in the shade Rose Gold, and I love it! The creamy formula glides on effortlessly, providing a beautiful, shimmery rose gold hue that brightens my eyes. Itu2019s long-lasting and doesnu2019t crease, making it perfect for all-day wear. Highly recommend for an easy, glamorous look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the caviar eyeshadow stick. Very beautiful shade, comes in a style of stick so super convenient. Compact to fit in small purse or pouchette. The formula is very easy to blend, last for hours. Elegant packaging! Highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is super creamy, glides on smooth and is long lasting. The color is very pigmented and has a nice shimmer. I would definitely recommend this as a new go to and will be looking at other colors as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a new favorite for my every day routine! Iu2019ve found these are very easy to work with and have pleasantly surprised me with how long they last on oily eyelids! I will definitely be purchasing some more shades!!!

reviews.review_title: A must have for a glam look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow stick is perfect for a quick yet gorgeous glam. I liked how it smoothly applied on my eyelid & it was easy to blend. The eyeshadow stick in shade amethyst lasted all night & looked radiant in all my pictures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Laura Mercier Modern Rose Caviar Stick Eye Shadow, and I'm honestly impressed. As someone who's always in rushing in the mornings, this has become my go-to for quick eye makeup.  The rose-gold shade is gorgeous u2013 it gives my eyes a subtle sparkle that's perfect for everyday wear. I love how easily it glides on; no brushes needed, just swipe and go. Plus, it stays put all day, even through my long work hours and after hour drinks  I will say, it took a bit of practice to get the blending just right - it is a little price but but given how often I use it and how long it lasts, I'd say it's worth the splurge. I'd definitely recommend giving this a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this eyeshadow stick for a week, I am sold! It goes on so effortlessly and the color (Modern Rose) is an amazingly versatile color that can be dressed up or down. The first time is used it was on a long day/night of walking in downtown Nashville and it did not disappoint! It never smudged or flaked and didnu2019t look cakey at all! The application is much easier than my current shadows and I love that the consistency enables you to build or swipe for whatever coverage youu2019re looking for. This is definitely a product I will buy in multiple shades and recommend to all my friends!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine,
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ver smooth eyeshadow , it makes my makeup routine easy . love to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from bzzagent and was really excited to try it after using similar eyeshadow sticks from a different brand. The first thing I noticed was how effortlessly the product goes on and how saturated the color is. Itu2019s absolutely beautiful! The rose gold color is so shimmery and light, and you can build up the color if you like. I have been using it as my go-to daytime color and it lasts all day. I will definitely be purchasing this eyeshadow in other colors, especially one a bit darker for evening looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, does not crease or budge throughout the day like many similar products I've tried in the past.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Laura Mercier gave me this product for free in exchange for my honest review through the BzzAgent Sampling program. I have been using this eyeshadow for a little over a week now and have tried it with multiple different makeup routines. I love how easy and fool proof this eyeshadow is. With just a few swipes on my eyes, I have a nice eyeshadow look. It is a good combination of sparkle and neutral eyes, which allows me to wear it on many different occasions. Overall, I would recommend this Caviar Stick. I have been eyeing this product for a while and am so happy to finally have tried it. It does start to fade if it is on my eyes all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Note: Incentivized, I was provided product(s) by BzzAgent and Laura Mercier for free for my honest review(s). This post contains no filters or other products under/over/mixed in.  Laura Mercieru2019s Caviar Stick Eyeshadow (Color: Strapless) has become a new staple in my makeup routine. I am not a huge wearer or fan of eyeshadow but I find this color just perfect. There is a slight shimmer but it wears light and blends easily. It doesnu2019t bleed or cake throughout the day or nights, and removes easily with makeup remover. The product packaging is slim and light, so very easy for travel and the application is one of the easiest eye products Iu2019ve ever used. I will definitely be purchasing this again when I run out and suggesting this to family and friends!

reviews.review_title: A win for easy eye looks that last all day long!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eye Color in Amethyst is a must-have for anyone looking to add a touch of effortless sophistication to their eye makeup routine. This cream eyeshadow stick combines convenience with high performance, making it a staple in my beauty arsenal.  The shade Amethyst is a gorgeous, shimmering mauve with just the right amount of sparkle to catch the light beautifully without being over the top. Which I was originally worried about being too dark, but was happily surprised and turned out to love the color. The formula is incredibly creamy and glides smoothly across the eyelid, allowing for easy application and blending.   One of the standout features of this product is its impressive staying power. Once it sets, it doesn't budge, ensuring your eye makeup looks fresh and vibrant all day long. Which was a key win for me with this product.   Overall, the Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eye Color in Amethyst is a fantastic addition to any makeup collection, offering a blend of luxury, practicality, and stunning color payoff.  Disclaimer: This review is based on my personal experience with the product, and individual results may vary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These stick eyeshadows are so easy to use. So pigmented, smooth and lasts a good 8 hour days. The consistency doesnu2019t pull on the skin cuz theyu2019re super creamy, but not greasy or too slippery. An eyeshadow brush is optional, because you can use the warmth of your fingers to blend. I would suggest using a good eye primer if you have very oily eyelids but these are the perfect eyeshadow products for people on the go!   I had the opportunity to try three different shades and theyu2019re all so pretty. The lighter shades are perfect for the high points of the face as highlight and the bronzy one for all over the lid or to deepen just the outer corner of the eyes.  The only con is that is a bit pricey for such a small simple product, but other than that I do recommend! they are such a user friendly compact product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given This Caviar Stick eye shadow to try. I absolutely love how creamy and smooth it goes on. This product can be built up a little with multiple swipes. Easy to use, clean application and shimmer is gorgeous. My own downfall of this specific color (Strapless) is that it basically matches my skin tone, still beautiful though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This creamy eyeshadow stick is a must! All the colors have great pigment, especially the shimmery eyeshadow. The dusty rosy pink has a subtle look, but that's what I love about the shade. It is so easy to apply with just a few swipes, and applies / blends in effortlessly with just your finger (using a brush works too)! I found the eyeshadow to last all day without creasing or fading, and even withstood the summer heat. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an easy to use, long lasting eyeshadow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received  this product for free in exchange for writing the review. It's like a magic because i thought about stick eyeshadow. I'm very exited. They are so beautiful. It is so easy to apply in comparison with eyeshadow palette - it is like a magic. Now I want to buy other shades. They holds all the day very good. I recommend to try them !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live in Florida where it's super hot so I generally don't use stick eyeshadows because they tend to crease. This product changed my mind! I have a fairly light complexion but this color is a great accent for my eyeshadow. It's a little on the shimmery side for my everyday wear but this will be my new go-to for date night and occasions. I was really impressed with how well it stayed on all day despite being sweaty and humid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a must have for anyone looking to have a quick and easy eye look! I normally don't wear eye shadow from day to day but this was beautiful and really added a pop to my eyes. SUPER easy to blend, if you have little to no experience with makeup this is such an easy product to integrate into your daily routine. I have oily eyelids and tested it without primer to see the lasting power - it did last most of the day but ended up creasing towards night time, so if you typically have that problem you will need a primer. Otherwise, this product adds a great metallic shine without being too sparkly so it can work for any type of look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color Strapless! I love the way it stays in place and didnu2019t crease. I wore it to a formal event and my eyes looked stunning! I layered other colors around it and it blended nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got the product to try, I really liked how easy it was to apply. I try to avoid eyeshadows since most leave residue but this was great. Easy to apply. Manageable and lasted the whole day. I really loved the color

reviews.review_title: A must-try for a effortless look!

I was impressed with how well it stayed on my eyes all day and didn't get glitter all over my face.

reviews.review_title: A great on the go shadow

I will try this again in other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time i've ever used a stick eyeshadow and I was so pleasantly surprised! I wore this to an outdoor event with nearly 100 degree weather. While my foundation didn't stay place, my eyeshadow did! I would love to see matte options available, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eyeshadow is a game changer. It makes putting on eyeshadow a simple and quick process. I use this without primer, as it stays put better on its own. My shadow lasts nearly all day. I can even blend a couple of colors with my finger. This is a staple in my daily routine! Modern Rose is a beautiful muted pink with a light gold/sparkle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this shadow stick. It is very creamy with a smooth texture that blends out flawlessly and sets into a skin-like finish that doesnu2019t budge. It doesnu2019t irritate my very sensitive, allergy-prone eyes or lids. The amethyst color is beautiful, the perfect toned-down shade of purple that gives a pop of color without being overwhelming. This color is a shimmer which I usually avoid as most other brands Iu2019ve tried tend more towards glittery which is not the look I'm after. This one was such a pleasant surprise: a grown-up finish that doesnu2019t leave glitter particles all over my face. Iu2019m a big fan! Thanks Bzz Agent and Laura Mercier for the complementary product in exchange for my very honest review!

reviews.review_title: A quick and easy product to use in a rush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eyeshadow and I must say, it exceeded my expectations! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Laura Mercier Caviar eyeshadow stick glides on smoothly and easily. I have the shade Modern Rose and it's a beautiful, pigmented pinky, slightly golden shade on my eyes. It's a nice neutral that I can wear everyday. It is long wear that fades nicely.

I received this product for free from Laura Mercier in the shade Amethyst, in exchange for my honest review. The shade is a beautiful dusty, purple-toned, metallic shimmer. The shade is very pigmented, but wasnu2019t the most flattering for my skin tone. However, I would purchase this product in a different shade. This product is very easy to apply and very comfortable on the lids. It is really lightweight and doesnu2019t even feel like I have anything on my eyes when I wear it. It is very creamy and rich, and rolls on the eyelid very smoothly. In the past, I have tried other eyeshadow sticks that required more pressure to be applied to roll the product on and almost felt like I was dragging it across my eyelid (which doesnu2019t feel great for the eye area), so I was pleasantly surprised at how light-handed you can be with this product. You really donu2019t have to apply much pressure at all, and it doesnu2019t feel tight or dry on the lid like others I have tried. Because of how creamy it is, I feel like it would definitely need to be paired with a good primer to get it to last for 24 hours and be transfer proof for someone with eyelids on the oily side like me. It would definitely be great in the winter or on skin that is more dry. I didnu2019t use primer and wore this product in the heat for about 8-10 hours. It didnu2019t crease, smear, or run, which is sooo important to me as a contact lens wearer (iykyk), but by the end of the night I noticed it had faded a bit. It doesnu2019t seem to budge on the eye, but it does rub off pretty easily if you rub your hand against it. I applied some to the back of my hand and let water run on it to test if it was waterproof, and Iu2019m happy to say the swatch remained perfectly intact!

reviews.review_title: Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eyeshadow in Modern Ros
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eyeshadow in the shade Modern Rose offers a seamless blend of luxury and functionality. This product embodies the brand's reputation for high-quality cosmetics and delivers a delightful experience for any makeup enthusiast.  Packaging and Presentation The product is housed in a sleek, twist-up stick that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The compact size is perfect for travel or everyday carry, ensuring you can easily slip it into your purse for quick touch-ups. The cap clicks securely into place, preventing any accidental messes or damage.  Shade and Pigmentation Modern Rose is a gorgeous soft pink with a subtle shimmer that adds a touch of sophistication to any look. The pigmentation is excellent, providing rich, opaque color in a single swipe. The shade is buildable, allowing for a more intense look when layered, or a softer, more diffused effect when blended out. This versatility makes it suitable for both daytime and evening wear.  Texture and Application The creamy formula of the Caviar Stick glides effortlessly onto the eyelid, providing a smooth and even application. It blends easily, whether you use a brush or your fingers, allowing for precise application and creative looks. Despite its creamy texture, it sets quickly to a long-lasting, smudge-proof, and crease-resistant finish.  Longevity and Performance One of the standout features of the Modern Rose Caviar Stick is its impressive longevity. The eyeshadow stays in place for hours without fading or creasing, even on oily eyelids. Its waterproof and smudge-proof properties make it an ideal choice for long days, special events, or any occasion where you need your makeup to last.  Versatility This eyeshadow stick is incredibly versatile. In addition to being used on the eyelids, it can double as an eyeliner or an eyeshadow base to enhance the color and longevity of powder eyeshadows. The Modern Rose shade can also be used as a blush or a highlighter.

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Laura Mercier Strapless Caviar Stick Eye Shadow, and I'm thrilled with it!  Application: The formula is incredibly smooth and glides effortlessly onto the eyelids. It blends beautifully, allowing for seamless transitions and easy layering.  Shade: The color is stunningu2014rich and vibrant yet versatile enough for both day and night looks. It adds a beautiful pop to the eyes without being overpowering.  Blendability: This eyeshadow stick is highly blendable, making it perfect for creating a variety of looks, from a subtle wash of color to a more intense, dramatic effect.  Packaging: The packaging is convenient and sleek, making it easy to carry in your makeup bag for quick touch-ups on the go.  Overall, the Laura Mercier Strapless Caviar Stick Eye Shadow is a fantastic product. Its smooth application, gorgeous shade, blendability, and elegant packaging make it a must-have for any makeup collection. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Caviar Stick for free from Laura Mercier in the shade Amethyst.   First of all, I'm not usually big into shimmery products, but the shimmer in this eyeshadow stick is both subtle and glam. It glistens really prettily and doesn't look or feel chunky. The stick glides on smoothly but doesn't melt or move around after it has set.   I was prepared for the color to be a lot less saturated and more sheer that it looks but it goes on with medium opacity, so you do get some decent color payoff. It is a little sheer, more sheer than an eyeliner stick, and it can be built up a bit and blended out with a small brush. I enjoyed applying it on the top of my inner corner and along the center of my lid for a bit of glam, and applied some liquid eyeliner along my upper lash line.   Good also if you want a subtle eyeliner-like look on the bottom without raccoon eyes- apply to the bottom outer lash line like an eyeliner pencil and set with a bit of neutral eyeshadow. You get a nice, subtle eye makeup look. Love a product like this that can be used for multiple looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I wanted to thank Laura Mercier for giving me this product for free in exchange for my unbiased opinion. The Caviar stick is an absolute dream to blend, and it's very creamy. It's also super gentle on my sensitive skin, and doesn't cause my eyes to burn like some liner products tend to. I wish that it lived up to the 24 hour wear that it quotes, since it melts off my oily lids even with primer midway through the day. The color is beautiful, but it's more subtle than I was expecting for an amethyst shade. I'd say it's more of a bronze shade? It photographs as taupe. Layering only adds more shimmer, and doesn't necessarily increase the color. I do own another caviar shade stick in the shade moonstone that I use regularly as a highlight on my browbone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this eyeshadow stick for a few weeks as my everyday eyeshadow. I don't wear a ton of makeup if I don't have a lot of meetings during my workday, which usually didn't include eyeshadow. But this actually had me adding it to my routine. It goes on super smooth and the color lays down really nicely. It's not too sheer or too dark. I barely needed to blend it out. I definitely want to try more colors and am excited.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the convenience of shadow sticks. Beautiful shimmer and a unique color. Easy to blend and layer with other shadows

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love using this for a fun, glowy eye look. It builds up so you can do a thin shine or how a solid glitter look. Itu2019s super cute for the beach or a night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love these products but this one didnu2019t wow me. It was very sheer and did not last super long on my lids. It also felt u201crunnyu201d compared to others Iu2019ve used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the gold glitter eyeshadow, and I am absolutely in love! The color is stunning and perfect for adding a touch of glamour to any look. The glitter particles are fine and apply smoothly without any fallout. It stays on all day without creasing, and the pigmentation is fantastic. I highly recommend this product and will definitely be purchasing it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product.  Application is so easy, it's easy to build color or to make it sheer. Very easy to get smooth and consistent coverage.  It has just a little shimmer, not too sparkly and it wears well lasting all day. Love and would buy again!

reviews.review_text: Great eyeshadow, light on skin, no residue, easy to apply, can be used by adults and teens (i let my daughters try it). Smooth and light texture, compact travel size ideal for small-to-medium sized purses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Laura Mercier for sending me this product this product! I loved how easy it was to apply and blend. Its perfect for an everyday look with just a quick swipe on the eye to give your eye just a little something extra. I also loved it to apply on top of other shimmer eyeshadow for more of a night time, going out look. I would definitely keep this in my purse for incase of emergency make up situations lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eyeshadow in the color Strapless, and I'm absolutely in love with it. The creamy, rich color glides on easily and blends beautifully. I wore it all day without any smudging or creasing. The waterproof formula is awesome. I would highly recommend this eyeshadow stick to anyone looking for long-lasting, vibrant color with little effort.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my make-up bag!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this eyeshadow stick in the shade strapless when i don't have a lot of time to do my make-up. This eyeshadow stick is so quick to wash a pop of color on your eyelids takes me about 10 seconds total to apply it then blend it out quickly. This product is so easy to blend but be sure to blend it before it sets because after that its staying put all day. Thank you Laura Mercier for kindly sending me this product to test out.

reviews.review_title: Makes putting on eye shadow fun again!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed by this eyeshadow stick. It glides on effortlessly without tugging on my eyelids. It has buildable coverage and I am able to create a simple look with just this one color by pulling it up into my crease and blending the edges with my fingers. Best of all, you don't need an under-eye primer as it does not crease! This is a product I have never seen before, and has made putting on eyeshadow much more effortless. Over the years I have used eyeshadow less frequently, due to the hassle of taking out a brush and having to blend. This product makes it so easy and this shade is perfect for my light/medium skin tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan of the Laura Mercier Caviar sticks for a quick eye look. I tried the shade u201cModern roseu201d - a dusty rosy pink. The stick glides smoothly without tugging the lids giving you time to blend. The lasting power on these eyeshadows are good especially for the summer days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan. This eyeshadow stick goes on smoothly and easily and stays put all day. I canu2019t wait to try other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a free sample -- loved it!  Goes on nice and smoothly and the color is very pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color to this is very beautiful. It glides on release smooth and itu2019s easy enough to make the eye color become very vibrant or just subtle by just smudging it a little bit more easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After discovering these eyeshadow sticks, I donu2019t use regular eyeshadow anymore. They go on smoothly and are fool proof because of how easy it is to blend. There is also no fall out onto your cheeks because thereu2019s no loose powder! In addition to using it as regular eyeshadow, I use Amethyst on my lash line as well when I want to forego eyeliner but still enhance the area. I like it so much I got it in other colors too!

reviews.review_title: Assumed this was overhyped until I tried it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not expect to like this as much as I did. When I told my mother-in-law that I was getting this, she told me that she personally preferred the Bobbi Brown version, which I also used as my go-to shadow sticks for an easy put-together look when I donu2019t have the time or energy to use a palette.   I was totally expecting to be underwhelmed by the Caviar Stick, and I also saw it as heavily advertised and possibly overhyped. Boy, was I wrong!  The moment I started trying my new Caviar Stick in Rose Gold, I was sold.  Like my mother-in-law, I have hooded eyes that make applying eyeshadow difficult. But unlike her, I have super oily skin that makeup smudges on easily, and that extends even to my eyelids. I also have crinkly lids, Iu2019m not sure if itu2019s an age thing, related to the shape of my eyes, or related to my numerous surgeries that aimed to correct congenital glaucoma, but I was honestly amazed that, even without primer or any other product on my lids, it applied effortlessly. I was able to u201ccolor inside the linesu201d on my first try. I didnu2019t get a smudgy or jagged crease like I get with the Bobbi Brown shadow sticks that result in me having to correct them with a Q-tip or makeup remover pad after the fact. It just glides on seamlessly - literally. What amazed me even more was how easily I was able to apply it to my right eye, as Iu2019m completely blind in that eye. The picture I attached reflects the fact that I had to go over it a few times to make sure I didnu2019t miss a spot on my right lid (as a precaution), but on my left lid, I got it in one try. Iu2019m pretty dumbfounded.   Whatu2019s also great is that itu2019s super pigmented, and not chalky, streaky, or sheer. I canu2019t say the same about the first coat of any other shadow stick I ever used.  So yes, as much as I hate to buy into hype, this is totally worth it. The color is super subtle and pretty too, and it goes on effortlessly for an effortless look.

reviews.review_title: Im so exited I received this .
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this this product for reviewing it and all I can say is that itu2019s the only eyeshadow stick that is literally so soft and high pigmented . You only need one swipe to have the best day eyeshadow and when you add more it becomes a night out kind of eyeshadow Iu2019ve been using it everyday . Such a beautiful color. Highly recommend!!

I enjoyed using the Caviar Stick Eyeshadow for its convenience and shimmery color payoff. I don't usually gravitate towards shimmery colors, but Modern Rose was easy to use without looking messy. While it was fairly easy to blend and layer on top of my base shadow, I noticed some creasing at the end of the day, so I'd recommend not applying too much to avoid this problem.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Modern Rose - roseglow shimmering dusty rosy pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this eyeshadow regularly for the past two weeks, and it has consistently garnered compliments. The stick makes it so easy to apply, and despite its smooth texture, it has a non-greasy finish that looks more like regular shadow than most other eyeshadow sticks I have tried. The Modern Rose shade was very flattering.  Thanks, Laura Mercier! I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eyeshadow is fantastic. It applies smoothly, offers rich color, and lasts all day without creasing. Its versatile design allows it to be used as an eyeshadow, eyeliner, or base. Compact and perfect for travel, this eyeshadow stick is a must-have for easy, long-lasting makeup. Highly recommend!
